synopsis: In episode #13 titled 'SOLOOO 2: I quit my job', Devam shares his transformative journey after leaving his job, exploring themes of self-discovery, creativity, and the importance of taking a break. He reflects on his travels, new experiences like DJing, and the challenges of navigating life without a rigid plan, all while encouraging listeners to embrace their own journeys.
quotes: You need to be at peace with the way you're living your life.
We're not on this planet to slave away and be like productivity monkeys creating value for our bosses.
Sometimes it's enough to just breathe. Like that's okay.
If you're just staying numb and in the same cycles of stress and release, you're not helping anyone.
You can make a good show and the world may not be ready for it.
I felt so much self-inflicted pressure to make progress on all these different things.
It takes an incredible amount of courage and privilege to be able to take that leap into something unknown.
I realized I just needed something different.
If I go back to software, I want to do it because I like it.
Your time and your energy are valuable.
